StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PrecursorsEnigma_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_PrecursorsEnigma_Icon] Precursors' Believer

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PrecursorsEnigma_Dec
StringTable.String: Convinced that the enigmatic Precursors live among us, potentially stirring both awe and tension.[BR][BR]+2 [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and -5% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DreadfulMelody_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_DreadfulMelody_Icon] Melodically Challenged

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DreadfulMelody_Dec
StringTable.String: Their lack of musical prowess has been known to stir diplomatic tensions and unintended laughter.[BR][BR]10% penalty on trade deals when assigned as Diplomat.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_RelativisticReunion_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_RelativisticReunion_Icon] Time's Wanderer

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_RelativisticReunion_Dec
StringTable.String: Bearing the burden of time dilation, this leader grapples with an intense yearning for times once known.[BR][BR]+10% [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NamingGame_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_NamingGame_Icon] Petname Giver

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NamingGame_Dec
StringTable.String: Their quirky penchant for bestowing pet names may endear or alienate; the balance is always in flux.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SecretWatchers_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_SecretWatchers_Icon] Secrets Guardian

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SecretWatchers_Dec
StringTable.String: Bound to the clandestine group "The Watchers", they navigate a realm of peril and promise.[BR][BR]+5% [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and -3% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NemesisLegacy_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_NemesisLegacy_Icon] Renowned Nemesis

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NemesisLegacy_Dec
StringTable.String: Shadows of an old nemesis linger, influencing every diplomatic maneuver and battlefield strategy.[BR][BR]-25% Trade Deal Bonus when assigned as Diplomat.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_MuteMysteries_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_MuteMysteries_Icon] Silent Enigma

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_MuteMysteries_Dec
StringTable.String: A shrouded past conceals mysteries that could sway cultural and governmental ties.[BR][BR]+5 [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and -3% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_LostColonyShip_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_LostColonyShip_Icon] Void's Drifter

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_LostColonyShip_Dec
StringTable.String: The haunting memory of an adrift colony ship forever lingers in their choices.[BR][BR]+5% [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerals[/HS] and +5% [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] when assigned as Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_UnfinishedAutobiography_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_UnfinishedAutobiography_Icon] Eternal Memoirist

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_UnfinishedAutobiography_Dec
StringTable.String: Ever-engrossed in penning their life's tale, often to the distraction of present duties.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_UnfulfilledDream_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_UnfulfilledDream_Icon] Aspiring Scientist

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_UnfulfilledDream_Dec
StringTable.String: Considers themselves something of a scientist despite having no formal education.[BR][BR]+2 [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] and -4 [HS=HS_Loyalty]Loyalty[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DarkPast_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_DarkPast_Icon] Shadow-phobic

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DarkPast_Dec
StringTable.String: A dark event from yesteryears makes them wary of dimly lit places, casting shadows on their decisions.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ShadowlessArtifact_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_ShadowlessArtifact_Icon] Shadowless Relic

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ShadowlessArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries around an enigmatic shadowless artifact.[BR][BR]+1 [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS], +4 [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and -5% [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] when assigned as Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_HostageChild_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_HostageChild_Icon] Hostage Raised

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_HostageChild_Dec
StringTable.String: Raised as the hostage of a hostile group before returning to the Civilization of their parents.[BR][BR]+10% Trade Deal Bonus when assigned as Diplomat.[BR][BR]-5% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AncientBloodline_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_AncientBloodline_Icon] Heir of Antiquity

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AncientBloodline_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries the weight of an age-old lineage.[BR][BR]+5 [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Wealth[/HS] and -5% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.[BR][BR]+10% Trade Deal Bonus when assigned as Diplomat.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ChildOfProphecy_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_ChildOfProphecy_Icon] Oracle Born

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ChildOfProphecy_Dec
StringTable.String: Encircled by prophecies from birth.[BR][BR]+5 [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and +10% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.[BR][BR]+15% Trade Deal Bonus when assigned as Diplomat.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DocumentDestroyer_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_DocumentDestroyer_Icon] Living Document

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DocumentDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Famed for verbal orders after an unfortunate document blunder, decisions now ride on recollections and swift redress.[BR][BR]-1 [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Wealth[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_HereticPast_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_HereticPast_Icon] Heretical

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_HereticPast_Dec
StringTable.String: Known for unorthodox beliefs and behaviors.[BR][BR]-2 [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and -10% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FramedInnocent_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_FramedInnocent_Icon] Wrongfully Charged

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FramedInnocent_Dec
StringTable.String: Once ensnared in a political conspiracy, charged with wrongs they didn't commit.[BR][BR]-3% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PirateFamily_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_PirateFamily_Icon] Corsair Lineage

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PirateFamily_Dec
StringTable.String: Rumored to have ancestral ties with space brigands.[BR][BR]+5 [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Wealth[/HS] and +15% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SilverPlatter_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_SilverPlatter_Icon] Gilded Upbringing

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SilverPlatter_Dec
StringTable.String: Raised in a life of luxury.[BR][BR]+3 [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Wealth[/HS] and -10% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Dreamer_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderTrait_Dreamer_Icon] Dreamweaver

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Dreamer_Dec
StringTable.String: With a touch of chemical aid they claim to hold great sway over dreams.[BR][BR]+3 [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and -1 [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] when appointed Governor.
